content: MW-LP L Cable lock kit with wire rope loop ending Wire rope with end loop and adjustable lock for suspending fixtures from suitable building features such as steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire suspension kits give you a much faster alternative to traditional methods with threaded rod Versatile – you can use the same wire suspension kit with a wide range of fixtures, base materials and Hilti MT strut and MVA ventilation hardware, simplifying inventory management Easier to adjust – self-locking wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making levelling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler. Pre-mounted safety nuts on the locks can then be tightened to help fix the wire rope securely in place Productivity services available – engineering and prefabrication services can be provided on complex projects SMACNA compliance – tested and verified according to the HVAC Duct Construction Standards (ANSI/SMACNA 006-2006) Applications Suspending HVAC fixtures, including spiral and rectangular ductwork (using compatible MVA duct hangers), from steel beams Lateral bracing Suspending electrical fixtures from beams – including cable trays, cable baskets, conduit racks, or lighting Suspending architectural elements from concrete or steel – including acoustic, heating and cooling panels, as well as overhead grids Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Wire: steel, Lock: aluminium Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Wire: steel, Lock: aluminium | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2331652 - Wire kit MW-LP L 2.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331653 - Wire kit MW-LP L 2.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331654 - Wire kit MW-LP L 2.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc - 2331658 - Wire kit MW-LP L 3.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331659 - Wire kit MW-LP L 3.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331660 - Wire kit MW-LP L 3.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc
